text: "I Saw the Light" is a 1972 song by Todd Rundgren and is the opening track from his third studio album Something/Anything?. It went to number 15 in Canada, number 16 in the United States, number 21 in Australia and number 36 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Todd Rundgren songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Power pop songs
title: I Saw the Light (Todd Rundgren song)
